channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Development/Evaluation Kits for PROFINET IO: DK Standard Ethernet Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Development/Evaluation Kits for PROFINET IO: DK Standard Ethernet Controller

item.title: CVE-2017-2681|2024-09-10T09:33:20.658Z -- siemens -- development%2Fevaluation%20kits%20for%20profinet%20io%3A%20dk%20standard%20ethernet%20controller
item.description: Specially crafted PROFINET DCP packets sent on a local Ethernet segment (Layer 2) to an affected product could cause a denial of service condition of that product. Human interaction is required to recover the system. PROFIBUS interfaces are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2017-2680|2024-09-10T09:33:18.492Z -- siemens -- development%2Fevaluation%20kits%20for%20profinet%20io%3A%20dk%20standard%20ethernet%20controller
item.description: Specially crafted PROFINET DCP broadcast packets could cause a denial of service condition of affected products on a local Ethernet segment (Layer 2). Human interaction is required to recover the systems. PROFIBUS interfaces are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2019-10923|2024-09-10T09:33:22.534Z -- siemens -- development%2Fevaluation%20kits%20for%20profinet%20io%3A%20dk%20standard%20ethernet%20controller
item.description: An attacker with network access to an affected product may cause a denial of service condition by breaking the real-time synchronization (IRT) of the affected installation.
